We integrate our remote IT, AI and backoffice staff into your team, saving you at least 30% on personnel costs ‚Äì 100% flexible via freelance contracts and ready to start within one week.

Submit your RaaS search request in just 3 minutes and receive non-binding candidate suggestions immediately.

hero.title: About
hero.subtitle: Since 2016, we have been Germany's leading platform for international remote professionals. We connect companies with the best talent worldwide.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.p1: We make international expertise accessible to German companies. With our Resources as a Service (RaaS) model, we revolutionize how companies access talent ‚Äì flexible, efficient, and without borders.
mission.p2: Instead of traditional employment, we provide remote resources through service contracts and create immediate access to qualified specialists worldwide.

0.title: International Expertise
0.desc: We connect German companies with the best international talent worldwide.

1.title: Verified Quality
1.desc: Every remote professional goes through our multi-stage qualification process.

2.title: Fast Placement
2.desc: From request to integration in just 2-4 weeks.

3.title: Measurable Success
3.desc: 98% customer satisfaction and over 90% project continuation rate.

joachim.p1: My name is Joachim Kalff, founder and managing director of Hej Talent. With our 'RaaS' concept, we rethink HR processes: fresher, smarter, simply better! 'Hej' comes from Scandinavian and means 'hello', a greeting with a 'wake up' character. It has always felt friendly, refreshing and sympathetic to me.
joachim.p2: Moreover, 'Hej' combines the initials of my children Henry and Emilia. The 'J' stands for my first name. I want to combine the positive Scandinavian spirit with personality ‚Äì and that‚Äôs how I approach our international remote staff: I take responsibility.
joachim.p3: With passion and dedication, I develop innovative and sustainable solution concepts. Down to earth, efficient, creative ‚Äì out of the box.

qa.q1: Why is staffing important to me?
qa.a1: Because companies don't grow through products, but through people. Behind every success are talents who contribute their personality, ideas and energy.
qa.q2: What drives me at Hej Talent?
qa.a2: Creating connections that go beyond AI ‚Äì real encounters based on trust, authenticity and shared values. Technology can do many things, but can never replace human depth and trust.
qa.q3: My best moments at Hej Talent are‚Ä¶
qa.a3: ‚Ä¶when talents and companies realize they match not only professionally but also personally. That's when a job becomes a real life opportunity.

pascal.p1: I am Pascal Spie√ü, Consultant at Hej Talent, with more than 11 years of experience in consulting and sales. I have always been driven by how companies can work more efficiently, flexibly and successfully ‚Äì and that‚Äôs exactly where I focus today.
pascal.p2: I enjoy working with our clients within our 'RaaS' concept ‚Äì fast, flexible and cost-effective.
pascal.p3: At Hej Talent, I help companies overcome the skills shortage and sustainably optimize processes. Together with our clients, I integrate international remote talent ‚Äì from AI and tech talent to backoffice and accounting professionals to IT and software developers.

qa.q1: Why is staffing important to me?
qa.a1: Because the right person in the right place can achieve more than any strategy. Staff is not just a resource, but the heart of every organization.
qa.q2: What drives me at Hej Talent?
qa.a2: The conviction that careers should not depend on coincidences or algorithms. But on encounters that create meaning and open doors.
qa.q3: My best moments at Hej Talent are‚Ä¶
qa.a3: ‚Ä¶when people realize: 'Here I am seen ‚Äì just as I am.' That's when opportunities arise that go far beyond the next job.

hero.title: How
hero.subtitle: From the first RaaS request to the successful integration of your remote resource ‚Äì our proven 4-step process guarantees the best candidates.

left.title: RaaS ‚Äì a revolutionary service concept
left.p1: is more than just a modern term ‚Äì it is a fundamentally different approach to providing professionals. Unlike traditional recruitment or temp agencies, with us you don‚Äôt sign
left.p2: This distinction is crucial: while employment relationships bring rigid structures, notice periods and extensive legal obligations, our RaaS model offers
left.p2c: . You get exactly the expertise you need ‚Äì when you need it.
left.p3: Our remote professionals are not your employees but specialized
left.p3c: , seamlessly integrated into your project structures. This means: no ancillary wage costs, no social security contributions, no vacation entitlements or sick leave on your side.
left.highlightA: Up to 60% cost savings compared to local full-time staff
left.highlightC: without hidden personnel costs and the ability to

right.title: International expertise without borders
right.p1c: from different time zones and cultures. This diversity is no coincidence but a strategic advantage: access to talent and perspectives not available locally.
right.p2: Each of our remote resources goes through a
right.p2c: : technical skills tests, language proficiency checks, reference validation and cultural compatibility assessment. The result:
right.p2e: and an average project continuation rate of over 90%.
right.p3c: thanks to international time zone coverage. While your local team sleeps, our resources continue working ‚Äì continuous productivity gains.
right.highlight: The legal structure is crystal clear:
right.highlightC: for our remote professionals ‚Äì from contract design to quality assurance to backup planning in case of failures. You focus solely on your core business while we ensure the

process.title: Our
process.subtitle: Click on a step to see the corresponding app view

steps.title: Needs Analysis
steps.details: In a detailed conversation, we analyze your current challenges, desired skills, and budget. We identify the type of remote professionals you need.

steps.title: Candidate Matching
steps.details: Based on your needs analysis, we present you with 3-5 pre-qualified remote candidates from our network. Each candidate is carefully matched to your requirements.

steps.title: Interview & Selection
steps.details: You conduct interviews with the proposed candidates. We support you throughout the selection process and contract negotiations.

steps.title: Onboarding & Support
steps.details: We accompany the onboarding of your new remote professional and are available for questions. Regular check-ins ensure smooth collaboration.

appScreen.desc: See here how {step} works in our RaaS Hub

benefits.title: Why our process works
items: Fast start: qualified remote professional in 2-4 weeks
Vetted quality: all candidates pass our screening process
Flexible work models: full-time, part-time or project-based
Transparent communication: regular updates and feedback
Cultural fit: international remote candidates with the right work culture
Legal certainty: all labor law aspects are covered

hero.title: - Verified AI Developers
hero.p1: Our proven RaaS system makes it simple: describe your AI project, we deliver the perfect developer solution.
hero.p2: Exclusive video shows you the proven 3-step RaaS process for highly qualified developers from our network ‚Äì no risk and with money-back guarantee.

0.title: 30-50% cost savings
0.text: Save up to ‚Ç¨4,000 per month with the same quality through our direct network

1.title: 48h matching process
1.text: From request to perfect developer in just 2 days ‚Äì start within 7 days

2.title: 100% money-back guarantee
2.text: Not satisfied? Full refund within the first 14 days ‚Äì no questions asked

trust.title: Over 50 companies already trust Hej Talent

testimonials.0: "Within 5 days I had the perfect AI developer. Saves us ‚Ç¨3,200 monthly with better quality."
testimonials.1: "The excellent work of a new colleague convinced us to bring a second Hej Talent resource into the team."

0.q: How do you ensure developer quality?
0.a: Every developer goes through a 3-stage vetting process: technical skills tests, live coding session, and reference check. Only 8% of all applicants meet our standards.

1.a: GDPR-compliant, German servers, and NDAs with all developers. Your project data remains 100% confidential and secure.

2.a: All our developers work in European time zones and communicate professionally using your preferred tools.

3.q: What contract models do you offer?
3.a: Flexible according to your needs: full-time, part-time or project-based. Monthly cancellation possible, no long-term commitments.

footer.tagline: Your partner for verified international remote AI developers.

problem.title: Do you recognize these backoffice challenges?

items.title: Overwhelmed teams
items.desc: Administrative tasks consume time needed for core business and growth

how.title: How it works: Your backoffice professional in 3 simple steps

0.title: Create request via our platform
0.text: Log into our system and define your backoffice requirements. Choose task areas, qualifications, working hours and language skills through our intuitive user interface.

1.title: Automatic matching & candidate selection
1.text: Our system automatically matches suitable backoffice professionals from our pool. You receive a list of 3-5 qualified candidates within 48h directly in the platform.

2.title: Interview & productive start
2.text: Appointment booking and interview coordination run through the platform. After your decision, we handle contracts, onboarding and tool setup. Start within 2-4 weeks.

trust.title: Over 30 companies are already optimizing their backoffice

testimonials.0: "Thanks to remote accounting, we save ‚Ç¨2,800 monthly and finally have time for our core business. Great!"
testimonials.1: "The excellent work of a new colleague convinced us to bring a second Hej Talent resource into the team."

0.q: Which backoffice areas do you cover?
0.a: We place professionals for accounting, administration, customer service, data entry, HR support and other administrative tasks.

1.a: All backoffice professionals go through a multi-stage vetting process: professional tests, language skills, work samples and reference checks.

2.a: Flexible from 10h/week to full-time. Our backoffice professionals work in European time zones for optimal collaboration.

3.a: 100% GDPR-compliant, encrypted communication, NDAs with all staff and regular security audits.

footer.tagline: Remote backoffice professionals for German companies

problem.title: Do you recognize these IT challenges?

items.title: Months of searching
items.desc: 6+ months recruiting for a senior developer ‚Äì projects delay, deadlines burst

items.title: Overpriced freelancers
items.desc: ‚Ç¨120+/h for mediocre freelancers ‚Äì budget explodes, quality disappoints

items.title: Unreliable agencies
items.desc: High headhunter fees, poor matches, no guarantees ‚Äì money gone, problem remains

problem.resultTitle: The result: Missed opportunities, frustrated teams, exploding costs
problem.resultText: While you search for the perfect developer, competitors overtake you with finished products.

solution.title: The solution: Verified senior developers in 48 hours

0.title: 48h perfect match
0.text: From 1,000+ verified developers we find the perfect match for your project in 48h

1.title: 97% success rate
1.text: Our 3-stage vetting process guarantees highest quality ‚Äì only 3% of all applicants pass

2.title: Start in 7 days
2.text: After the match: onboarding, setup and productive work within one week

how.title: How it works: Your developer in 3 simple steps

0.title: Create request via our platform
0.text: Log into our system and create a detailed search request. Define technology stack, experience level, project duration and special requirements directly in the user interface.

1.title: AI matching & candidate review
1.text: Our system analyzes your request and automatically matches suitable candidates from our talent pool. You receive a curated list of 3-5 top matches within 48h directly in the platform.

2.title: Interview management & onboarding
2.text: Appointment booking, interview coordination and contract processing run completely through the platform. After your selection, we handle the complete onboarding and setup.

finalCta.title: Start TODAY with your new developer team
finalCta.text: Book your free initial consultation now

trust.title: Over 100 companies develop with our remote developers

0.a: All modern technologies: React, Vue, Angular, Node.js, Python, Java, .NET, Go, Ruby and more. Frontend, backend, mobile, DevOps ‚Äì we have experts for everything.

1.a: 3-stage vetting process: technical skills assessment, live coding challenge and reference check. Only the top 3% meet our standards.

2.q: Can I start with just one project?
2.a: Yes! Project-based collaboration is possible. Upon success, you can switch to longer-term contracts anytime.

3.q: What happens if I'm not satisfied?
3.a: 100% money-back guarantee within the first 14 days. If it doesn't fit, we find a replacement for free or refund all costs.

4.q: How quickly can the developer start?
4.a: After the match: 7-14 days until productive start. In urgent cases, faster is also possible.

footer.tagline: Senior IT developers for German businesses

hero.title: - AI & ML Experts
hero.p1: Our proven RaaS system makes it simple: describe your AI problem, we deliver the perfect expert solution.
hero.p2: From AI strategy to productive solution: get specialized data scientists, ML engineers and AI developers from our verified expert pool ‚Äì remote and immediately available.

0.title: AI specialists
0.text: Data scientists, ML engineers and AI developers with PhD/Master and 5+ years of practical experience

1.title: Proven AI solutions
1.text: From computer vision to NLP ‚Äì field-tested solutions for your business model

2.title: ROI focus
2.text: Measurable business results in 3-6 months instead of years of research

problem.title: Why do most AI projects fail?

items.title: Missing AI know-how
items.desc: Internal teams have no experience with ML projects and overestimate the complexity

items.title: Months of searching
items.desc: Qualified data scientists are rare and overpriced ‚Äì if available at all

items.title: No business focus
items.desc: Projects get stuck in endless research without measurable business results

how.title: How it works: Your AI expert in 3 simple steps

trust.title: Leading companies trust our AI experts

0.q: Which AI technologies do you cover?
0.a: Machine learning, deep learning, NLP, computer vision, recommendation systems, predictive analytics and more. We have experts for all common frameworks.

1.q: How qualified are the AI experts?
1.a: All have a relevant degree (Master/PhD), 5+ years of practical experience and proven success in productive AI projects.

2.q: Can I start with a PoC?
2.a: Yes! We recommend 3-month projects for proof of concepts before you invest in larger implementations.

3.a: Depending on complexity: PoC in 3 months, MVP in 6 months. We focus on fast, measurable results instead of lengthy research.

footer.tagline: AI & ML experts for German businesses
